title: data breach
extract: A data breach occurs when personal information held by an organisation is lost or subjected to unauthorised access or disclosure. The NDB scheme only applies to data breaches involving personal information that are likely to result in serious harm to any individual affected.
extract_html: A data breach occurs when personal information held by an organisation is lost or subjected to unauthorised access or disclosure. The NDB scheme only applies to data breaches involving personal information that are likely to result in serious harm to any individual affected.
